  • urllib
    • Reading json file from URL

# urllib

# Reading json file from URL

from urllib import request
import json

with request.urlopen('http://118.24.241.17/path.json') as f:
    data = f.read()
    data_json = json.loads(data.decode('utf8'))

data_json is the json file we need.
